text: Sherri Lynn Stoner or Sheryl Stoner, Sherri Stoner, Sherry, Boom-Boom (born July 16, 1959) is an American actress, writer, animator and voice actress is known for Slappy in Animaniacs and later shows. as a model reference of the 1989 film The Little Mermaid character Ariel. as of 2023, from par on voice acting in years.
